text_chunk:
**Batalhão Limeirense**

**LIMEIRA — Estado de São Paulo**

Altura: 1,70
Côr: branca
Cabellos: | Côr: castanhos
           | Forma: liso
Barba: preta
Bigode: não usa

Olhos: azues
Bocca: regular
Rosto: alongado
Nariz: afiuado
Signaes: 

![Image: Portrait photograph of a man wearing a head covering]

Nome: Carlos Jabuticabett

Assignatura: 

Reservista: não Carlos Jabuticabett

---

Presidente da Commissão                Vice Presidente                Secretário
Marchibieski                                                          Oliveira Albuquerque

Prefeito                               Delegado de Policia            Instructor
[signature]

raw_response.output_text:
{"image_analysis": "This is a Brazilian military service record form from the 'Batalhão Limeirense' (Limeira Battalion) located in Limeira, Estado de São Paulo. The document features a centered portrait photograph of a man wearing a head covering. The form contains physical description fields on the left and right sides, including height, hair color and form, beard, mustache, eye color, mouth, face shape, and nose characteristics. Below the photo is a name field and assignatura (designation) field. At the bottom are signature lines for various officials including Presidente da Commissão, Vice Presidente, Secretário, Prefeito, Delegado de Policia, and Instructor. Reference numbers appear in the top left (C.23, 91/9) and top right (165+). The document features a centered portrait photograph of a man wearing a head covering. The form contains physical description fields on the left and right sides, including height, hair color and form, beard, mustache, eye color, mouth, face shape, and nose characteristics. Below the photo is a name field and assignatura (designation) field. Reference numbers appear in the top left (C.23, 91/9) and top right (165+). Multiple handwritten entries and signatures are present throughout the document.

text_chunk:
Nome : Carlos Selincurt

Filho de : Adolpho Selincurt

e de : Helena Selincurt

Nascido em : 18-1-1890

Natural de : Brenena - Alemanha

Município de --

Profissão : Official aposentado do Exército Allemão, 1º Tenente Cavalaria

Estado civil : casado

Vacinado : Sim     Lê : Sim     Escreve : Sim     Conta : Sim

Sabe Nadar : Sim     Cyclista : Sim     Motorcyclista : não     Condutor : não

Chauffeur : não     Telegraphista : não     Telephonista : não

Residencia : Largo Estação, 1 - Dureira

Observações : Alistado em 11/3/92 para o Esquadrão de Cavalaria

{"image_analysis": "This is a historical Brazilian military service record form from the archives. It is a typed form with handwritten entries in Portuguese. The document contains personal information fields arranged vertically in a single column. Key visible elements include: personal details (name, parentage, birth date, birthplace), municipality, profession, civil status, vaccination and literacy status, various skills (swimming, cycling, motorcycling, driving, telegraphy, telephony), residence address, and observations. All entries are handwritten in cursive script. The document appears to be on aged, off-white paper with visible creasing. No page numbers are visible in headers or footers.
